Melee.name: Strong Swing
Melee.effect text: Unaimed melee attacks deal 1 additional damage

Melee.name: Wind Knocker
Melee.effect text: If your melee attack beats the targets Armor and Dodge scores, make a Brawn check of 10 to stun them

Melee.name: Wild Strike
Melee.effect text: Once per combat, make a melee attack. You can use your unused action(s) to boost the damage by 3 per unused action

Melee.name: Surge of Strength
Melee.effect text: Once per combat, add 1d6 of damage to a melee attack

Melee.name: Double Slash
Melee.effect text: Attack a target twice, but don't add positive modifiers from weapons

Melee.name: Repetitive Strike
Melee.effect text: +1 to a die if you already attacked this turn

Melee.name: In the Zone
Melee.effect text: If you land 3 attacks in a single turn, roll an extra die on Swift checks and add 10 meters of movement until your next turn ends

Ranged.name: Long Shot
Ranged.effect text: Add +2 to ranged attacks over 25 meters away

Ranged.name: Quick Adjustment
Ranged.effect text: If you missed your first ranged attack this turn, add +2 to your next attack roll

Ranged.name: Pinpoint Accuracy
Ranged.effect text: Add your Intellect to a die on ranged aimed shots

Ranged.name: Never Miss
Ranged.effect text: Once per combat, your next ranged aimed attack hits, even if it is out of your weapon's max range or if the target is behind cover

Ranged.name: Trigger Happy
Ranged.effect text: In the first round of combat, make two ranged weapon attacks

Ranged.name: Run and Gun
Ranged.effect text: If you started this turn behind cover and will end this turn out of cover, make an additional ranged attack

Ranged.name: Point Blank
Ranged.effect text: Ranged attacks made within 10 meters deal +1 damage

Ranged.name: Termination
Ranged.effect text: If you killed or set an enemy to 1 HP, reload all weapons and make a bonus ranged attack

Protection.name: Armor Up
Protection.effect text: +1 to Armor Score when wearing armor

Protection.name: Unscathed
Protection.effect text: Ignore the first status effect in combat

Protection.name: Impervious
Protection.effect text: Once per rest make a brawn check of 6. On success, you can't take more than 1 damage per attack until the end of your next turn

Protection.name: Near Invincible
Protection.effect text: Double the amount of HP gained from Overshield

Protection.name: Bulking Up
Protection.effect text: Lose 5 meters of movement. Gain +2 HP whenever you permanently gain Brawn

Protection.name: Taunt
Protection.effect text: Force an enemy within movement range to move towards you and use ALL their actions to melee attack you on their next turn. At full health, this is a bonus action

Protection.name: Behind Me
Protection.effect text: Interrupt a ranged attack and move up to 15 meters to intercept it

Protection.name: Aid the Tank
Protection.effect text: If you were hit since your last turn, gain +2 additional HP when healed and roll an additional attack die

Evasion.name: Illusive
Evasion.effect text: Once per combat, double your Dodge Score until the end of your next turn

Evasion.name: Barely Scathed
Evasion.effect text: getting behind partial cover doesn't take an action

Evasion.name: Disarm
Evasion.effect text: If an enemy fails to beat your Dodge Score, make a Swift check of 10 to disarm the target

Evasion.name: Untouchable
Evasion.effect text: You have two bonus uses of Skillful Dodge per rest

Evasion.name: Sprinter
Evasion.effect text: +2 to Dodge Score on turns where you used an action to make a second movement

Evasion.name: Evasive
Evasion.effect text: +2 to Dodge Score, -2 to max HP

Evasion.name: Slide Kick
Evasion.effect text: If you used 2 movement actions this turn, make a melee attack as a bonus action. This attack rolls 2d6 + Dodge Score, deals 2 damage, and halves the target's movement on success

Evasion.name: Pure Speed
Evasion.effect text: Once per combat, gain a bonus movement action per attack this turn

Ambush.name: In the Shadows
Ambush.effect text: Roll an additional die on Swift checks related to sneaking

Ambush.name: Surgical Strike
Ambush.effect text: No penalty for the first aimed ambush of combat

Ambush.name: Return to the Shadows
Ambush.effect text: If you still have an action after an ambush attack, perform a Swift check of 6 behind partial cover to re-enter stealth

Grappling.name: Off the Top Ropes
Grappling.effect text: Any fall damage taken during grapples is applied to your opponent instead. +1 to grappling checks

Grappling.name: No Escape
Grappling.effect text: Gain a bonus movement action the turn after a target escapes your grapple

Grappling.name: Spinning Throw
Grappling.effect text: Throw a target up to 20 meters. If they hit a solid object, they take damage equal to your Brawn score. Anyone else they collide with also takes damage equal to your Brawn score

Grappling.name: World Champion
Grappling.effect text: Your movement is not restricted when grappling and you can grapple two enemies at once

Performance.name: Crowd Favorite
Performance.effect text: After succeeding a Charisma check in a crowd, +1 to your Charisma until you fail a Charisma check

Performance.name: Feeling Yourself
Performance.effect text: Gain +2 to your next attack roll after a successful Charisma check

Performance.name: Dreamboat
Performance.effect text: Characters who could be attracted to you must pass a Charisma check of 8 to be able to attack the first round of combat

Performance.name: Beloved
Performance.effect text: If you have ever passed a Charisma check against an NPC, they will come to your aid if you are attacked as long as you have not attacked them

Performance.name: Conversationalist
Performance.effect text: When talking to someone in a faction you have stored Faction Points with, +2 to Charisma checks

Performance.name: Smooth Recovery
Performance.effect text: After failing a Charisma check, you get a bonus die for your next one

Performance.name: Curry Favor
Performance.effect text: Spend a faction point to pass all Charisma checks with that faction for the rest of the day

Performance.name: Favorite Son
Performance.effect text: Unlock everything from a faction once

Intimidation.name: Confidence Killer
Intimidation.effect text: Charisma check of 6 to give an enemy -2 to a stat of your choice until the end of your next turn. (Can't effect HP)

Intimidation.name: Imposing
Intimidation.effect text: You can't be attacked until you make a hostile action

Intimidation.name: Hand it Over
Intimidation.effect text: Charisma check of 6 to rob the target of any non-precious item with no risk of immediate conflict.

Intimidation.name: It's so Over
Intimidation.effect text: Once per rest, make a Charisma check of 12 to end combat

Support.name: Encourage
Support.effect text: Once per rest, Charisma check of 10. On success, give an ally 2 bonus dice on their next stat check or attack. On fail, they get 1 bonus die

Support.name: Ubreakable
Support.effect text: Once per rest, Charisma check of 6. On success, they can't go below 1 HP until the end of your next turn.

Support.name: Coaching
Support.effect text: Once per rest, give yoru allies a bonus action on their next turn

Support.name: Without Fail
Support.effect text: Once per rest, until the end of your next turn, allies automatically pass their checks and their attacks always hit.

Observation.name: Foreknew
Observation.effect text: Know one enemy's next turn. If your Intellect is 4 or higher, you may use this once per turn as a bonus action

Observation.name: Tactical Sight
Observation.effect text: You know the HP of all enemies that are within eyesight and have taken damage in this combat. Also, you can't be ambushed.

Observation.name: Mind Reader
Observation.effect text: Intellect check of 8. On success, read the target's mind

Observation.name: Mastermind
Observation.effect text: As long as an enemy doesn't take a hostile action against their allies, you can play their next turn

Medicine.name: Heal
Medicine.effect text: Intellect check of 4. On success, heal an ally for 2 HP and remove 1 status effect. Can't be used on 2 consecutive turns

Medicine.name: Stabilize
Medicine.effect text: Targets revived from the death state gain 3 HP and an additional action on their next turn

Medicine.name: Patch-up
Medicine.effect text: During rests you can heal 1 ally to max HP

Medicine.name: Booster
Medicine.effect text: Healing is doubled for targets below half HP

Wayfaring.name: Never Lost
Wayfaring.effect text: Intellect check of 6 to get accurate directions and common knowledge of a location

Wayfaring.name: Survivalist
Wayfaring.effect text: Party heals 3 additional HP per rest and can not be ambused when they are not in an urban environment

Wayfaring.name: Spirit of Adventure
Wayfaring.effect text: You always know the general location of the nearest rare item that isn't in your possession. +2 to Intellect checks while in pursuit

Wayfaring.name: True North
Wayfaring.effect text: You know all hidden enemy, trap, and item locations
